content.text: Read the article below carefully  as many times as necessary. Has Emily and Ross's effort been rewarded?

content.text: Last night, my friends Emily and Ross danced in a competition for New York's annual commemoration. The city‚Äôs foundation happened in the 17th century. The first settlers were the Dutch people, they had found the bay before French and British people. As a consequence, the city had been named New Amsterdam prior to the English dominion.

content.text: For this commemoration, the topic was ‚ÄúThe Latino heritage‚Äù. My friends couldn‚Äôt believe it!   They danced salsa all night. They had practiced for almost a year previous to  the competition. They were excellent on the floor.

content.text: After everyone had danced last night, the judges announced the winners. Emily and Ross had won! They couldn‚Äôt believe it! They were the best dancers on site and they won the city award. Ross said she had never practiced so hard before. The effort was worth it!
